actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kans. for airport purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to release the restrictions on the use of property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kansas, for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Elkhart, Kans. for airport purposes.
